function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate social infrastructure and facilities such as health centers, nurseries, and kindergartens","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and limited access to healthcare","Mitigation":"Investment in and improvement of social infrastructure and facilities, as well as promoting healthcare access","Technologies":"Healthcare technology and telemedicine for remote healthcare access","People":"Residents, especially children and families","Owner":"Local government and city planners"},{"Description":"Lack of green spaces and high greenery in residential areas","Impact":"Reduced access to recreational areas and limited exposure to nature","Mitigation":"Creation and maintenance of green spaces, promotion of urban gardening and green infrastructure","Technologies":"Green building technology, urban agriculture, and sustainable urban design","People":"Residents, especially individuals seeking recreational spaces and nature exposure","Owner":"City planners and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of communal and social spaces within housing projects","Impact":"Limited opportunities for social integration and community gathering, leading to social isolation","Mitigation":"Designing communal spaces, promoting community engagement, and fostering social activities within residential areas","Technologies":"Smart community design, social networking platforms for local communities, and urban planning tools","People":"Residents, especially those seeking social interaction and community engagement","Owner":"Urban developers and community organizations"}]}
